mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( title, contents, created_ymd, creator_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, NOW(), 'admin' )
mapper.select: SELECT board_idx, title, contents, hit_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(created_ymd, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_ymd, creator_id FROM board WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hit_cnt = hit_cnt + 1 WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx}
